Title: Paschke dilations
Source: Electron. Proc. Theor. Comput. Sci., EPTCS
Abstract: © Westerbaan & Westerbaan.In 1973 Paschke defined a factorization for completely positive maps between C∗-algebras. In this paper we show that for normal maps between von Neumann algebras, this factorization has a universal property, and coincides with Stinespring's dilation for normal maps into B(ℋ).
